description: LRU-like configuration for Mockingjay replacement policy

features.name: pc_hash
features.description: Hash of program counter, minimal impact for LRU-like behavior

features.name: age
features.description: Time since insertion, HIGH weight makes this behave like LRU

features.name: access_count
features.description: Number of accesses, small negative weight to slightly favor frequently used

features.name: reuse_distance
features.description: Distance since last access, moderate weight

notes: High age weight (0.80) makes this policy behave similarly to LRU by prioritizing eviction of oldest entries. Online learning disabled for consistent LRU-like behavior.
